long_description: Light like a pair of backcountry touring skis but designed for the resort with rockered tips and tails, the women's Rossignol Saffron 7 skis take on any terrain on the mountain in any snow condition. The Saffron 7 skis are right at home lapping freshly fallen powder or blasting through crud, and they carve responsively on hardpack snow and groomed runs. Float like a feather on top of deep snow thanks to the rockered tips and tails; redesigned Powder Turn rocker minimizes the tendency of tips to flap at high speeds. Standard camber underfoot offers tenacious edge-grip on hardpack; there's more than enough camber to enjoy carving on groomers. Lightweight wood core strikes a balance between manueverability and strength. You'll really appreciate the weight savings when the Saffron 7 skis are strapped to your pack and you hike up the ridge to get first tracks. The responsive strength of the skis shines when dropping into steep terrain, negotiating a technical line, and straight-lining it back to the base. 98mm waists require bindings with wide brakes. Base or topsheet color may vary from photo.
short_description: Light like a pair of backcountry touring skis but designed for the resort with rockered tips and tails, the women's Rossignol Saffron 7 skis take on any terrain on the mountain in any snow condition.
